mwr_raw2l1.utils.config_utils module

get_conf(file)[source]

conf get dictionary from yaml files. Don’t do any checks on contents

get_inst_config(file)[source]

get configuration for each instrument and check for completeness of config file

get_nc_format_config(file)[source]

get configuration for output NetCDF format and check for completeness of config file

mwr_raw2l1.utils.file_utils module

abs_file_path(*file_path)[source]

Make a relative file_path absolute in respect to the mwr_raw2l1 project directory. Absolute paths wil not be changed

datestr_from_filename(filename, datestr_format='yyyymmddHHMM')[source]

return date string from filename, assuming it consists of the last digits of the filename before the extension

Parameters

  • filename – filename as str. Can contain path and extension.

  • datestr_format – format of the date string in the filename. Only used for counting length of date string

Returns

string containing the date in same representation as in the filename

generate_output_filename(basename, time, ext='nc')[source]

generate filename from basename, ext and end time inferred from data time vector (basename_yyyymmddHHMM.ext)

Parameters

  • basename – the first part of the filename without the date

  • time – xarray.DataArray time vector of the data in numpy.datetime64 format. Assume to be sorted

  • ext (optional) – filename extension. Defaults to ‘nc’. Empty not permitted.

get_binary(filename)[source]

return the entire content of the binary file as binary stream

get_corresponding_pickle(filename_rawdata, path_pickle, legacy_reader=False)[source]

get pickled file from previous read-in corresponding to raw data file

get_files(dir_in, basename, time_start=None, time_end=None)[source]

get files in dir_in corresponding to basename.

If time_start and/or time_end are given only files with end time before/after these are returned.

Parameters

  • dir_in – directory where files of the respective instrument are located

  • basename – first part of the filename (usually full identifier including wigos-station-id and inst-id)

  • time_start (optional) – string in format ‘yyyymmddHHMM’, ‘yyyymmddHHMMSS’, ‘yyyymmdd’ or any of the similar

  • time_end (optional) – analogous to time_start

Returns

list of files in dictionary corresponding to basename and time criteria

pickle_dump(data, filename)[source]
pickle_load(filename)[source]

mwr_raw2l1.utils.transformations module

timedelta2s(t_diff)[source]

return number of seconds from numpy timedelta64 object :param t_diff: time difference as :class:`numpy.timedelta64’ object

Returns

scalar corresponding to number of seconds
